targets.rawSql: SELECT MAX(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - updated_at))) AS lag FROM indexer.sync_checkpoints WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT COUNT(*) as chains FROM indexer.chains WHERE enabled = true
SELECT sum(event_count) FROM indexer.hourly_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT count() FROM indexer.supply_events WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT count() FROM indexer.new_pools WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND created_at >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT uniqMerge(unique_tokens) FROM indexer.hourly_new_pools_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)

SELECT c.chain_id, c.name, c.enabled, COALESCE(n.price_usd, 0) as price_usd, s.last_indexed_block, (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - s.updated_at)) * 1000)::int AS lag_ms FROM indexer.chains c LEFT JOIN indexer.sync_checkpoints s ON c.chain_id = s.chain_id LEFT JOIN indexer.native_token_prices n ON c.chain_id = n.chain_id ORDER BY c.chain_id
SELECT name, native_token_address, stable_token_address, stable_pool_address FROM indexer.chains WHERE enabled = true ORDER BY chain_id
SELECT hour as time, sum(event_count) as events FROM indexer.hourly_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour

SELECT toStartOfHour(timestamp) as time, count() as transfers FROM indexer.supply_events WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_tvl_usd), 0) as total_tvl FROM indexer.mv_pool_summary WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT sum(total_volume_usd) FROM indexer.global_stats FINAL WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pool_count), 0) FROM indexer.mv_pool_summary WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(token_count), 0) FROM indexer.mv_token_summary WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT sum(total_swaps) FROM indexer.global_stats FINAL WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT sum(pool_count) FROM indexer.global_pool_stats FINAL WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(tvl_24h), 0) as total_tvl FROM indexer.mv_pool_summary WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id)
SELECT sum(volume_usd) FROM indexer.hourly_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT uniqMerge(active_pools) FROM indexer.hourly_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT uniqMerge(unique_tokens) FROM indexer.hourly_new_pools_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT sum(swap_count) FROM indexer.hourly_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT sum(pool_count) FROM indexer.hourly_new_pools_stats WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND hour >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR

SELECT chain_id, address, protocol, token0_symbol, token1_symbol, tvl_usd, volume_24h, price_usd FROM indexer.pools WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND tvl_usd > 0 ORDER BY tvl_usd DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 100

SELECT chain_id, address, protocol, token0_symbol, token1_symbol, total_volume_usd, tvl_usd, price_usd FROM indexer.pools WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) ORDER BY total_volume_usd DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 100

SELECT timestamp, chain_id, tx_hash, pool_address, token0, token1, volume_usd, price_usd, maker FROM indexer.events PREWHERE volume_usd >= $min_whale_value WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND event_type = 'swap' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT created_at, chain_id, pool_address, token0_symbol, token1_symbol, protocol, initial_tvl_usd FROM indexer.new_pools WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 50

panels.description: Enter a pool address above to view details

targets.rawSql: SELECT chain_id, address, token0, token1, token0_symbol, token1_symbol, token0_decimals, token1_decimals, base_token, quote_token, is_inverted, quote_token_priority, protocol, protocol_version, factory, fee, initial_fee, hook_address, created_at, block_number, tx_hash, reserve0, reserve1, reserve0_adjusted, reserve1_adjusted, sqrt_price_x96, tick, tick_spacing, liquidity, price, token0_price, token1_price, price_usd, price_change_24h, price_change_7d, volume_24h, swaps_24h, total_swaps, total_volume_usd, tvl_usd, last_swap_at, updated_at FROM indexer.pools WHERE ('$pool_search' = '' OR address = '$pool_search') AND ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) ORDER BY volume_24h DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 50

panels.title: 🏊 Pool Details (Top 20 by Volume)

panels.description: Recent events for the pool address entered above

targets.rawSql: SELECT timestamp, chain_id, tx_hash, event_type, pool_address, volume_usd, price_usd, amount0_adjusted, amount1_adjusted FROM indexer.events WHERE ('$pool_search' = '' OR pool_address = '$pool_search') AND ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 100

panels.title: 📜 Event History (Latest Events)

panels.description: Enter a token address above to view details

targets.rawSql: SELECT chain_id, address, symbol, name, decimals, price_usd, price_updated_at, price_change_24h, price_change_7d, logo_url, banner_url, website, twitter, telegram, discord, volume_24h, swaps_24h, total_swaps, total_volume_usd, pool_count, circulating_supply, market_cap_usd, first_seen_block, last_activity_at, updated_at FROM indexer.tokens WHERE ('$token_search' = '' OR address = '$token_search') AND ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) ORDER BY price_usd DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 50

panels.title: 🪙 Token Details (Top 20 by Price)

targets.rawSql: SELECT timestamp, chain_id, tx_hash, volume_usd, price_usd, event_type, pool_address, token0, token1, maker FROM indexer.events PREWHERE volume_usd > $max_price_filter WHERE ($chain_id = 0 OR chain_id = $chain_id) AND event_type = 'swap' ORDER BY volume_usd DESC LIMIT 100

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT chain_id FROM indexer.chains WHERE enabled = true ORDER BY chain_id
list.label: Chain
list.name: chain_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT chain_id FROM indexer.chains WHERE enabled = true ORDER BY chain_id
